main event: A civilian reported observing a bright circular object in the sky for about 2 hours and 30 minutes on July 7, 1968, in Thousand Palms, California.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright spherical object that changed direction and brightness suddenly., The observer reported the object appeared to split into smaller objects., The object was seen moving erratically in a zigzag pattern before disappearing., The sighting involved multiple witnesses who were confused about what they saw., The report noted that no conventional explanation could account for the phenomenon observed.
